What does the "category" field indicate in the transaction information returned by Verus?

The "category" field in the transaction information returned by Verus indicates the type of transaction. It can be one of two values:

* "send": Indicates a transaction with a negative amount, meaning VRSC was sent from the account.
* "receive": Indicates a transaction with a positive amount, meaning VRSC was received by the account.

Note that there is also a "move" category, which is used for transactions that move funds within the same account.

#### Arguments: 1. "blockhash"  (string, optional) The block hash to list transactions since 2. target-confirmations:  (numeric, optional) The confirmations required, must be 1 or more 3. includeWatchonly:    (bool, optional, default=false) Include transactions to watchonly addresses (see 'importaddress') #### Result: ```json {  "transactions": [   "account":"accountname",    (string) DEPRECATED. The account name associated with the transaction. Will be "" for the default account.   "address":"VRSC_address",  (string) The VRSC address of the transaction. Not present for move transactions (category = move).   "category":"send|receive",   (string) The transaction category. 'send' has negative amounts, 'receive' has positive amounts.   "amount": x.xxx,     (numeric) The amount in VRSC. This is negative for the 'send' category, and for the 'move' category for moves                      outbound. It is positive for the 'receive' category, and for the 'move' category for inbound funds.   "vout" : n,        (numeric) the vout value   "fee": x.xxx,       (numeric) The amount of the fee in VRSC. This is negative and only available for the 'send' category of transactions.   "confirmations": n,    (numeric) The number of confirmations for the transaction. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.   "blockhash": "hashvalue",   (string) The block hash containing the transaction. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.   "blockindex": n,     (numeric) The block index containing the transaction. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.   "blocktime": xxx,     (numeric) The block time in seconds since epoch (1 Jan 1970 GMT).   "txid": "transactionid", (string) The transaction id. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.   "time": xxx,       (numeric) The transaction time in seconds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT).   "timereceived": xxx,   (numeric) The time received in seconds since epoch (Jan 1 1970 GMT). Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.   "comment": "...",    (string) If a comment is associated with the transaction.   "to": "...",      (string) If a comment to is associated with the transaction.  ],  "lastblock": "lastblockhash"   (string) The hash of the last block } ```
